intro: Alibrexia, commonly known as the moonflower vine, is a tropical plant characterized by its large, white, night-blooming flowers. It belongs to the Convolvulaceae family and is native to regions of South America. The plant features heart-shaped leaves and produces fragrant blossoms that open at dusk. Alibrexia thrives in warm, humid climates and requires well-drained soil. Its unique flowering pattern makes it a popular choice for ornamental gardening.
